name: trelded
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl3an(w0, w1, w2, wcel(c0, c1), wtr(c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl3an(w0, w1, w2, c0 ∈ c1, Tr(c1), c0 ∈ c2, c2 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wtr(c1))
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w2, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(w3a(wtr(c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wtr(c1))
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w2, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(w3a(wtr(c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))

stmt.origin: 3impib(wtr(c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: 3impib(Tr(c1), c0 ∈ c2, c2 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wtr(c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wtr(c1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wtr(c1))
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w2, wcel(c2, c1))
-| wi(wtr(c1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wtr(c1), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wtr(c1))
-| wi(w1, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w2, wcel(c2, c1))

comment: Deduction form of ~ trel . In a transitive class, the membership relation is transitive. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-Dec-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
